description: "Originally published in Gerardus Mercator's ‘Atlas Sive Cosmographicae Meditationes de Fabrica Mundi et Fabricati Figura’ (1595), the title of which was the first use of the word ‘atlas’ to refer to a collection of maps. This is a 1630 reprint."
title: "Asia : ex magna orbis terre descriptione Gerardi Mercatoris desumpta, studio & industria G.M. Iunioris"
